Skills.title: Product Design
Skills.subtitle: I craft scalable solutions to complex problems through UX strategy, enterprise workflows, and design systems.

items.title: Product Design
items.description: I craft scalable solutions to complex problems through UX strategy, enterprise workflows, and design systems. I have led multiple product design teams across domains — building products that users love and businesses trust.

items.title: UI Design
items.description: I transform numbers into impactful stories. With deep expertise in dashboards, visual analytics, and executive data storytelling, I empower decision-makers to see what matters – fast.

items.title: Prototyping
items.description: I am focused on democratising business communication as a true power tool to help leaders motivate and move organisations using techniques that world leaders use to nudge millions.

aboutSection.heading: About Us
aboutSection.content: We are building a React site powered by a single JSON file.
